item.title: Friendship
item.description: Happy Valentine’s Day! Writing about love is a little risque for me, so here instead is a wonderful quote about friendship. I heard it on the University Channel Podcast where Robert Seiple mistakenly attributed it to George Eliot. It was actually written by Dinah Craik in her novel A life for a life (1859). Oh, the comfort – The inexpressible comfort of feeling safe with a person, Having neither to weigh thoughts,
